body_html:
@mushroom1116 You can take a look at it now:
https://github.com/IdRatherBeCoding/sparse_cnn/blob/master/sparse_cnn_back_prop.ipynb

Please let me know if something doesn't make sense.

I have tested the derivatives of Q with respect to M and ground state. I have not yet tested with an end to end CNN training.

@mushroom1116 You can take a look at it now:
https://github.com/IdRatherBeCoding/sparse_cnn/blob/master/sparse_cnn_back_prop.ipynb

Please let me know if something doesn't make sense.

I have tested the derivatives of Q with respect to M and ground state. I have not yet tested with an end to end CNN training.
